snippet: The company said it would resume serving all portion sizes of fries on Jan. 5 after resolving an inventory crunch stemming from labor disruptions on the West Coast of the United States....

headline.print_headline: McDonald’s in Japan Resolves Fry Shortage
headline.main: McDonald’s in Japan Resolves Fry Shortage

lead_paragraph: The company said it would resume serving all portion sizes of fries on Jan. 5 after resolving an inventory crunch stemming from labor disruptions on the West Coast of the United States.
abstract: McDonald's says it will resume serving all portions of French fries in Japan after limiting customers to only orders of small fries in December due to inventory shortage.
